description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
url: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
url: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
url: Heading levels should only increase by one

description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
url: <html> element must have a lang attribute

description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
url: Document should have one main landmark

description: Ensures links have discernible text
url: Links must have discernible text

description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
url: Interactive controls must not be nested

description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
url: All page content should be contained by landmarks

description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
url: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

description: Ensures ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
url: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

description: Ensures elements do not use deprecated roles
url: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

description: Ensures aria-hidden=true" is not present on the document body."
url: aria-hidden=true" must not be present on the document body"

description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
url: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

description: Ensures ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
url: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
url: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
url: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
url: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
url: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
url: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
url: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
url: Buttons must have discernible text

description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
url: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
url: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
url: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
url: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

description: Ensures headings have discernible text
url: Headings should not be empty

description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
url: Images must have alternate text

description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
url: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
url: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
url: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
url: Ensures landmarks are unique

description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
url: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
url: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
url: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

description: Ensures <meta name=viewport"> can scale a significant amount"
url: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

description: Ensures <meta name=viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming"
url: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
url: Page should contain a level-one heading

description: Ensures [role=img"] elements have alternate text"
url: [role=img"] elements must have an alternative text"

description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
url: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
url: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
url: Table header text should not be empty

description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
url: scope attribute should be used correctly

description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
url: tables should not have the same summary and caption

description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
url: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
url: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
url: Form field must not have multiple label elements

description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
url: Form elements should have a visible label

description: Ensures every form element has a label
url: Form elements must have labels

description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
url: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
url: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
url: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
url: Document should not have more than one main landmark

description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
url: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
url: Select element must have an accessible name

description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
url: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
url: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
url: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
url: Frames should be tested with axe-core

description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
url: Frames must have a unique title attribute

description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
url: Frames must have an accessible name

description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
url: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
url: Input buttons must have discernible text

description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
url: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
url: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
url: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
url: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name
